I'm on Kmeaw and have loads of games on internal HDD patched and fixed for 3.55 (both in Multiman and PSN games on XMB)... Will I need to re-patch/fix any of the installed games on CFW4.30?

Most (95%) of PS3 games will work no problems. Just delete any game data (not save data) if one doesn't. No patching required.

PSN games won't work without patching ie signing with new keys... luckily there is a program that does it with one click:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7864601/PS3_CFW_4.xx_Fully_Automatic_Resigner_v0.5b

At this point all the bugs in 4.30 have been ironed out, 3.55 has more and more unpatched new releases or only partially working. 

On 4.30 .. everything works, no patching.
